name: THE Skincare Template | Notion
description: Whether you are an expert of skincare or you want to start a routine, this template will be your best ally. In the Skincare Free version you will have:A perfect playlist for your self-care time.An skincare tracking table.Your tracking record of each week.Automatized button for a new tracking table for a new week.Clean and minimalistic aesthetic.In the Skincare Premium version you will add:A database for your products (table and gallery views).Automatized buying list of the almost done and empty
features: A perfect playlist for your self-care time.; An skincare tracking table.; Your tracking record of each week.; Automatized button for a new tracking table for a new week.; Clean and minimalistic aesthetic.; A database for your products (table and gallery views).; Automatized buying list of the almost done and empty products you need.; Knowledge about the status of your products and useful info.; In the price box, enter de m√≠nimum amount or more to get the template.; You will receive an e-mail with the access link.
